code: import{useEffect,useState}from"react";import axios from"axios";import{API_URL,API_TOKEN}from'../const';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const CoronaForContinent=()=>{const[headers]=useState([{title:'Continent',value:'continent'},{title:'Active Cases',value:'activeCases'},{title:'New Cases',value:'newCases'},{title:'Total Cases',value:'totalCases'},{title:'Total Deaths',value:'totalDeaths'},{title:'New Deaths',value:'newDeaths'},{title:'Total Recovered',value:'totalRecovered'}]);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(false);const[data,setData]=useState([]);const fetchData=async()=>{setLoading(true);const response=await axios.get("".concat(API_URL,"continentData"),{headers:{authorization:API_TOKEN}});setLoading(false);setData(response.data.result);};useEffect(()=>{fetchData();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"flex flex-col",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"inline-block min-w-full",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"text-2xl mb-4 font-bold text-gray-900",children:"Corona Table"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"overflow-hidden shadow-md",children:loading?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Loading..."}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("table",{className:"min-w-full",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("thead",{className:"bg-gray-600",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tr",{children:headers.map(item=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{className:"py-3 px-6 text-xs font-medium text-gray-300 uppercase text-left",children:item.title},item.title);})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tbody",{children:data.map(item=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tr",{className:"bg-gray-600 border-b",children:headers.map(subItem=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{className:"py-4 px-6 text-sm font-medium text-white whitespace-nowrap",children:item[subItem.value]},subItem.value);})},item.continent);})})]})})]})});};export default CoronaForContinent;
